TEXT.TITLE: DILLARD DEPARTMENT STORES INC <DDS> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ended Jan 31 Shr 1.16 dlrs vs 1.15 dlrs Net 32.4 mln vs 33.5 mln Revs 629.0 mln vs 538.6 mln Avg shrs 32.1 mln vs 29.2 mln 12 mths Shr 2.35 dlrs vs 2.29 dlrs Net 74.5 mln vs 66.9 mln Revs 1.85 billion vs 1.60 billion Avg shrs 31.7 mln vs 29.2 mln Note: Shr/avg shrs data show 2-for-1 split in Nov. 1985.
